page.index.pageTitle: EasyFlow - AI that creates your content
page.index.firstLiner.punchline: AI that generates your content in seconds
page.index.firstCase.explaination: Facebook Ad ? Blog Intro ? Product Description ? We have more than 40 categories.
page.index.secondCase.explaination: What do you want the AI to talk about ? Give it a few words to show it the way.
page.index.thirdCase.explaination: AI generates creative and relevant text based on what you entered. You can directly copy it and use it !
page.index.thirdLiner.slogan: Give a few words. Let the AI do the rest.
page.index.thirdLiner.explaination: EasyFlow uses technology based on AI. Thanks to Deep Learning, it is able to make connections that have never been done before. With just a few words, it can create specific text just for you.
page.index.fourthLiner.explaination: Words are automatically generated thanks to the Deep Learning algorithm. Creative and relevant marketing text are generated for you on the fly.

page.termsAndConditions.head.title: Terms And Conditions
page.termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
page.termsAndConditions.preambulePart1: EASYFLOW offers a web service (hereinafter referred to as the « SERVICE ») aimed at helping people, be they private individuals or legal entities, (hereinafter referred to as the « USER(S) ») who wish to create text content. The terms and conditions of this SERVICE are set out in these Terms and Conditions.
page.termsAndConditions.preambulePart2: Details regarding the EASYFLOW company are as follows: Yoann BUZENET,  Micro Entreprise EASYFLOW HeadQuarters : 9 Rue place Maréchal Foch, 56700 Hennebont, France, SIREN 804 965 101 00038, Tél : +336 13 64 92 72
page.termsAndConditions.article1Title: 1. Necessary conditions to access the SERVICE
page.termsAndConditions.article1.paragra: You may use the SERVICE only if you are 18 years or older and capable of forming a binding contract with EASYFLOW, and not otherwise barred from using the SERVICE under applicable law. If you are accessing and using the SERVICE on behalf of a company (such as your employer) or other legal entity, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that entity to these Terms. In that case, “you” and “your” will refer to that entity.
The USER does hereby declare that they fully understand what they can get from using the SERVICE offered by EASYFLOW as set out in these Terms and Conditions.
page.termsAndConditions.article2.title: 2. Duration / Cancellation
page.termsAndConditions.article2.subtitl: At the end of the initial subscription period, the Terms and Conditions will be renewed automatically by tacit agreement, unless you stop it. You will be billed monthly or annually, depending on the subscription chosen.
An extension of the SERVICE, called 'Reloads' allows you to use 20,000 more words during the 30 days following the purchase. It is not a subscription and is not renewed without your action.

In the event that the USER fails to perform some or all of their obligations under these Terms and Conditions, EASYFLOW may cancel these Terms and Conditions as of right and at any time, with or without formal notice being made to the USER to fulfil their obligations. EASYFLOW shall send any formal notice by any means of its choice, including by simple electronic mail (e-mail).
page.termsAndConditions.article3.paragra: The SERVICE consists in making available to USERS a software tool allowing them to create text for various uses, marketing in particular. From a few words, the SERVICE generates texts using artificial intelligence technology. Each USER can then, under his own responsibility, choose the texts he likes, modify them, generate others, copy them and use them as they see fit. EASYFLOW does not claim any ownership over the content produced by the USER.
page.termsAndConditions.article4.title: 3. LIABILITY
page.termsAndConditions.article4.paragra: a/ The USER is solely responsible for content used and produced from the SERVICE. You represent and warrant that any text or content used in or taken from the SERVICE will not transgress or contravene a third party’s intellectual property rights, or result in the violation of any applicable law or regulation.
b/ The SERVICE will be used in compliance with all applicable laws.
c/ The SERVICE will not be used to produce, use or communicate harmful, shoking, offensive, defamatory, threatening, obscene, sensitive or unsafe content.
page.termsAndConditions.article6.title: 4. FORCE MAJEURE
page.termsAndConditions.article6.paragra: Force majeure events shall suspend the obligations of the parties as regards the Terms and Conditions. However, if the force majeure event continues for over two (2) months, each party will have the option of putting an end to the Terms and Conditions by registered post with return receipt sent to the other party.
page.termsAndConditions.article7.title: 5. Right of withdrawal
page.termsAndConditions.article7.paragra: As a user residing in a member country of the European Union, you have the right to withdraw from any purchase made on EASYFLOW without giving a reason.

However, you agree that your legal right of withdrawal will end within 14 days or after you used 10,000 words of the SERVICE after your subscription, depending on what happens first. For any reimbursement process, please contact us at support@easyflow.com.
page.termsAndConditions.article8.title: 6. Miscellaneous
page.termsAndConditions.article8.paragra: These Terms and Conditions give the full obligations of the parties. The fact that either party does not take advantage of any shortcoming or any failure to perform any of its obligations or any other breach by the other party of any of its obligations under the Terms and Conditions shall not be interpreted as a waiver of the obligation in question or of any of the other provisions contained in the Terms and Conditions. Similarly, any delay or failure by either party to perform the rights and prerogatives granted to them under these Terms and Conditions shall not be interpreted as a waiver of these rights and prerogatives.
These Terms and Conditions constitute a full and exclusive whole of the terms of the agreement entered into between EASYFLOW and the USER.
page.termsAndConditions.article9.title: 7. Applicable law
page.termsAndConditions.article9.paragra: Competent jurisdiction : These Terms and Conditions are subject to interpretation and performance under French law. Any dispute between EASYFLOW and the USER relating to the existence, validity, interpretation or performance of the Terms and Conditions or of any of their clauses that the parties are unable to resolve amicably shall be ruled by the Paris courts.
page.privacy.head.title: Privacy policy
page.privacy.page.title: Privacy Policy for EasyFlow
page.privacy.paragraph1: At EasyFlow, accessible from www.easyflow.ai, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by EasyFlow and how we use it.
page.privacy.paragraph2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
page.privacy.paragraph3: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in EasyFlow. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
page.privacy.consent.title: Consent
page.privacy.consent.par1: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
page.privacy.informationWeCollect.title: Information we collect
page.privacy.informationWeCollect.par1: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
page.privacy.informationWeCollect.par2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
page.privacy.informationWeCollect.par3: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email.
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.intro: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.li1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.li2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.li3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.li4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
page.privacy.howWeuseInformation.li5: Communicate directly with you, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website
page.privacy.logFiles.title: Log Files
page.privacy.logFiles.par1: EasyFlow follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
page.privacy.GDPR.title: GDPR Data Protection Rights
page.privacy.GDPR.par1: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
page.privacy.GDPR.par2: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
page.privacy.GDPR.par3: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
page.privacy.GDPR.par4: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
page.privacy.GDPR.par5: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
page.privacy.GDPR.par6: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
page.privacy.GDPR.par7: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
page.privacy.GDPR.par8: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you  would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
